alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 9:37AM PST until January 05 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County and Northwestern Nye County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
